page.title: 11HOUSING - continued.
page.content:
four good sized bedrooms,a fully { } equiped kitchen, downstairs W.C, a large spacious hall,lounge and dining room, separate cloakroom and a brick built external porch with glass windows and door.A large garden at the rear and front garden also.On the first floor there is a tiled bathroom of which there is a shower,bath, handbasin and toilet.(The four bed rooms as before include one as an attic room).In the rear garden is situated a wooden shed and along the drive a large garage.Situated in a much sought area.
DETACHED MODERN HOUSE : Trevette Grey Road, Altrincham. PRICE Â£52,950. This house is conveniently situated within walking distance of Altrincham shopping centre.This detached house has gas fire central heating installed
